mapper.insert: insert into lg_freightcharges (freightChargesId, price, goosTypeAttribute, minDistance, maxDistance, minVolume, maxVolume, minWeight, maxWeight, remarks1, remarks2) values (#{freightchargesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goostypeattribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mindistance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maxdistance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{minvolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maxvolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{minweight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{maxweight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_freightcharges set price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goosTypeAttribute = #{goostypeattribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, minDistance = #{mindistance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, maxDistance = #{maxdistance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, minVolume = #{minvolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, maxVolume = #{maxvolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, minWeight = #{minweight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, maxWeight = #{maxweight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where freightChargesId = #{freightchargesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select freightChargesId, price, goosTypeAttribute, minDistance, maxDistance, minVolume, maxVolume, minWeight, maxWeight, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_freightcharges where freightChargesId = #{freightchargesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
